mapper.sql: id, uri, description, method_type, create_time, update_time

select sre.id as id,sre.uri as uri,sre.description as description, sr.id as rid,sr.name as role_name,sr.description as role_description from sys_resources sre left join sys_resources_role srer on srer.resources_id = sre.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = srer.role_id
mapper.select: select sre.id as id,sre.uri as uri,sre.description as description, sr.id as rid,sr.name as role_name,sr.description as role_description from sys_resources sre left join sys_resources_role srer on srer.resources_id = sre.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = srer.role_id where sre.uri = #{uri}

select sre.id as id,sre.uri as uri,sre.description as description, sre.method_type as method_type from sys_resources sre where sre.deleted = 0
and sre.uri like concat('%', #{queryResources.uri}, '%')
and sre.description like concat('%', #{queryResources.description}, '%')
and sre.method_type = #{queryResources.methodType}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_resources_role where resources_id = #{resourcesId} and role_id = #{roleId}
